guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for aripiprazole and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

text.html: The ABILIFY label states, "Dosage adjustments are recommended in patients who are known CYP2D6 poor metabolizers." For known CYP2D6 poor metabolizers, administer half of usual dose. For known CYP2D6 poor metabolizers taking concomitant strong CYP3A4 inhibitors (e.g., itraconazole, clarithromycin), administer a quarter of usual dose. The ABILIFY MAINTENA label states, "Known CYP2D6 poor metabolizers: Recommended starting and maintenance dose is 300 mg administered monthly as a single injection." For known CYP2D6 poor metabolizers taking concomitant CYP3A4 inhibitors, recommended dose is 200 mg. See labels for more information.
